entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 17 except minus 12 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 17 except minus 12 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
